com.tapsterrock.mpx
Class ResourceCalendar

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.tapsterrock.mpx.MPXRecord
        |
        +--com.tapsterrock.mpx.ResourceCalendar
public class ResourceCalendar
extends com.tapsterrock.mpx.MPXRecord

This class represents the Resource Calendar Definition record. It is used to define the working and non-working days of the week for a resource. The default calendar defines Monday to Friday as working days.

          Constant signifying the default condition.

addResourceCalendarHours

public ResourceCalendarHours addResourceCalendarHours(com.tapsterrock.mpx.Record record)
                                               throws MPXException
This method is used to add details of working hours to a resource calendar. The data to populate this record is read from an MPX file.
Parameters:
record - data read from an MPX file
Returns:
ResourceCalendarException object
Throws:
MPXException - thrown if the maximum number of hours has been added
